name: Welcome to Union Street - Spain Game Devs Jam III
name_original: Welcome to Union Street - Spain Game Devs Jam III
description:
Welcome to Union Street

Welcome to Union Street is a competitive puzzle challenge where two players have to place pieces on the board next to other pieces to conquer the territory.

CONTROLS Pieces
  • Use mouse to move pieces over the board.
  • Left Button to confirm piece position.
  • Right Button to rotate the piece.
  • Center Button (or GUI "Pass" button) to pass piece and turn.
  • Mouse wheel to zoom in and zoom out.
Camera
  • WASD to move the camera.
  • Q and E to rotate the camera
HOW TO PLAY

Each player plays one piece per turn. 

To play a piece player has to roll the dice by clicking on them at the bottom of the screen. When dice are rolled depending on the sum of results one piece is picked and should be placed or passed. 

When there aren't pieces of the current value the next available piece on the right is picked, if no there are no pieces on the right the loop starts at the left of the tab.

When a piece is placed all the next (vertical and horizontal) pieces are conquered for the current player and change their colors.

When all the pieces have been played the game ends and the player with more points is the winner. 
Points = Placed pieces of player's color - passed pieces by player

Upcoming Features
  • More and better effects
  • Play vs IA
  • Use left pieces on next turns
  • More buildings
  • More players???
  • Modes (Easy, Medium and Hard with different rules for points)
Used assets on this project
  • 2D Assets from GUI PRO Kit - Fantasy RPG by Layerlab
  • 3D Assets from Low Poly Ultimate Pack by Polyperfect

Developed by Eduardo Amengual.
